attributes.name: implementation

attributes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function allowing to perform a delegatecall to the given implementation.
This function will return whatever the implementation call returns

@dev This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded
@param implementation representing the address of the upgraded implementation
attributes.name: Upgraded

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor function

@dev Tells the address of the current implementation
@return address of the current implementation
attributes.name: implementation

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the current implementation
@param newImplementation address representing the new implementation to be set
attributes.name: setImplementation

attributes.documentation:
@dev Upgrades the implementation address
@param newImplementation representing the address of the new implementation to be set
attributes.name: _upgradeTo
ProxyOwnershipTransferred

attributes.documentation: @dev the constructor sets the original owner of the contract to the sender account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Tells the address of the owner
@return the address of the owner
attributes.name: proxyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Sets the address of the owner
attributes.name: setUpgradeabilityOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferProxyOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the proxy owner to upgrade the current version of the proxy.
@param implementation representing the address of the new implementation to be set.
attributes.name: upgradeTo
upgradeToAndCall

attributes.type: function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

attributes.documentation: @dev Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.
@dev Returns the address of the current owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

attributes.type: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"
attributes.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner

attributes.documentation: @dev Returns true if the caller is the current owner.
attributes.name: isOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call
`onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.

     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner,
thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).
Can only be called by the current owner.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: new owner is the zero address"
